item.title: 投资者在美联储推动的反弹中稍事休息，国债下跌
item.description: 美国国债下跌，缩减了本周的涨幅，因为投资者在为当天晚些时候将公布的通胀数据做准备，预计该数据将显示消费者价格增长加速。【原文：US Treasuries fell, trimming their weekly advance, as investors prepared for inflation data due later on the day that is expected to show an acceleration in consumer price growth.】

item.title: Centrica 正就 Sizewell C 核电项目 15% 的股份进行深入谈判
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Centrica Plc 正在就收购英国 Sizewell C 核电项目 15%的股份进行深入讨论。【原文：Centrica Plc is in advanced discussions to acquire a 15% stake in the UK’s Sizewell C nuclear power project, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达突围，4 万亿美元市值触手可及
item.description: 在 Nvidia 公司成为首家市值达到 1 万亿美元的芯片制造商从而创造历史两年后，一个更令人瞩目的里程碑即将到来：成为首家市值达到 4 万亿美元的公司。【原文：Two years after Nvidia Corp. made history by becoming the first chipmaker to achieve a $1 trillion market capitalization, an even more remarkable milestone is within its grasp: becoming the first company to reach $4 trillion.】

item.title: 美银美林的哈特内特认为美联储转向和减税带来股票泡沫风险
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，随着美国降息预期吸引大量投资流入股市，股市投机泡沫的风险正在增加。【原文：The risk of a speculative stock-market bubble is increasing as expectations of US interest-rate cuts draw massive investment flows into equities, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 利润引擎出现衰退，S&P 500 指数反弹面临关键考验
item.description: S&P 500 指数即将创下历史新高，但距离财报季只有几周时间，反弹的基础即将面临重大考验。【原文：The S&P 500 Index is on the cusp of a record high but with earnings season just weeks away, the foundation of the rally is about to get a major test.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数历史性季度反弹，推动指数逼近历史纪录
item.description: 在短短三个月内，从险些跌入熊市到距离历史最高点只差几个点。这一反弹具有历史意义。【原文：From narrowly avoiding a bear market to a few points shy of a record high in just three months. This rebound is historic.】

item.title: 贝莱德的 Brazier 因庞大的支出计划而对德国债券持谨慎态度
item.description: Blackrock Inc. 投资与投资组合解决方案全球主管 Alex Brazier 表示，尽管欧洲投资者可能会从美国带回现金，但由于德国雄心勃勃的财政扩张，德国政府债券看起来缺乏吸引力。【原文：German government bonds look unattractive due to the country’s ambitious fiscal expansion, despite potential appetite from European investors bringing cash home from the US, said Alex Brazier, Blackrock Inc.’s global head of investments and portfolio solutions.】

item.title: 印度 JSW 计划出售 4.68 亿美元债务以资助阿克苏交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度企业集团 JSW 集团正在与全球贷款机构洽谈，以筹集约 400 亿卢比（4.68 亿美元）的资金，为收购 Akzo Nobel NV 的本地业务提供部分资金。【原文：Indian conglomerate JSW Group is in talks with global lenders to raise about 40 billion rupees ($468 million) to partly fund its purchase of Akzo Nobel NV’s local business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非股市有望延续上半年黄金涨势
item.description: 南非股市将迎来近二十年来表现最好的上半年，贵金属价格可能会为进一步上涨铺平道路。【原文：South African stocks are heading for their best first-half performance in almost two decades, and precious-metal prices could pave the way for further gains.】

item.title: 中国 500 亿美元芯片基金转向对抗美国限制
item.description: 中国主要的芯片投资基金正计划重点关注中国在光刻技术和半导体设计软件等领域的关键短板，调整方法以更好地克服美国阻止其技术进步的努力。【原文：China’s main chip investment fund is planning to focus on the country’s key shortcomings in sectors like lithography and semiconductor design software, adjusting its approach to better overcome US efforts to stop its technological advances.】

item.title: 波罗的海燃油价格下跌导致俄罗斯燃油流量降至 8 个月来最低水平
item.description: 由于供应波罗的海港口的炼油厂延长了工作时间，加上在即将到来的农业和假日消费季节性激增之前努力稳定国内燃料供应，俄罗斯的石油产品出口量在 6 月份降至 8 个月以来的最低点。【原文：Russia’s oil product exports dropped in June to the lowest in eight months amid extended work at refineries supplying Baltic ports, coupled with efforts to stabilize domestic fuel supplies before the upcoming seasonal surge in agricultural and holiday consumption.】

item.title: 欺诈指控升级，Worldline 比利时分部受到调查
item.description: Worldline SA 的比利时分公司正在接受布鲁塞尔检察官的调查，因为媒体报道称这家支付服务公司涉嫌欺诈。【原文：Worldline SA’s Belgian arm is under investigation by Brussels prosecutors as the fallout continues following press reports over alleged fraud at the payment services company.】

item.title: 热浪威胁欧洲农作物和电力系统
item.description: 未来几天，热浪将炙烤西欧，气温将比正常温度高出 10 摄氏度，这将威胁到农作物的收成，给电力系统带来压力，并引发健康警报。【原文：A heat wave will bake western Europe in conditions as much as 10C above the norm in the coming days, threatening harvests, stressing power systems and triggering health alerts.】

item.title: 南非零钱银行和莱萨卡银行将以 6100 万美元的交易合并
item.description: 南非数字贷款机构零钱互助银行（Bank Zero Mutual Bank）由该国一家顶级贷款机构的前负责人创立，该机构正在与金融科技公司莱萨卡科技公司（Lesaka Technologies Inc.【原文：South African digital lender Bank Zero Mutual Bank, founded by the former chief of one of the country’s top lenders, is combining with a unit of fintech firm Lesaka Technologies Inc. in a 1.91 billion-rand ($61 million) deal.】

item.title: 苹果和谷歌被告知中国 DeepSeek 应用在德国是非法的
item.description: 苹果公司和谷歌的安卓系统被德国一家顶级隐私监管机构警告称，在其应用商店中提供的中国人工智能服务 DeepSeek 构成非法内容，因为它会将用户数据暴露给中国当局。【原文：Apple Inc. and Google’s Android have been warned by a top German privacy regulator that the Chinese AI service DeepSeek, available on their app stores, constitutes illegal content because it exposes users’ data to Chinese authorities.】

item.title: 印度米仓已满，稻米产量将再创新高
item.description: 印度的大米储量达到了至少二十年来的最高水平，这增加了印度在大米收成即将再创新高的情况下没有地方储存大米的风险。【原文：India’s stash of rice is running at the highest for this time in at least two decades, raising the risk it will run out of room to store it all as another record crop looms.】

item.title: EQT 支持的 SK Shieldus 24 亿美元等值贷款启动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，EQT 支持的韩国网络安全公司 SK Shieldus Co. 已启动了一笔约 24 亿美元的银团贷款，为支持其收购的一项融资进行再融资。【原文：EQT-backed South Korean cyber security firm SK Shieldus Co. has launched an around $2.4 billion-equivalent syndicated loan to refinance a facility that had backed its acquisition, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 安联保险集团、吉宝集团加入普林斯顿数字公司 4 亿美元贷款项目
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私人信贷基金安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）和吉宝信贷（Keppel Credit）将作为数据中心运营商普林斯顿数字集团（Princeton Digital Group）4亿美元私人信贷贷款的贷款人。【原文：Private credit funds Allianz Global Investors and Keppel Credit will come in as lenders for data center operator Princeton Digital Group’s $400 million private credit loan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国南城债权人酝酿提前举行清盘听证会
item.description: 违约开发商中国华南城控股有限公司（China South City Holdings Ltd.）的一群债券持有人正考虑要求法院提前清盘听证会的日期，该听证会现定于 8 月举行。【原文：A group of bondholders of defaulted developer China South City Holdings Ltd. is considering to ask the court to move up the date of a wind-up hearing, now scheduled for August.】

item.title: 与诺和诺德、礼来竞争的肥胖症药物在中国获批
item.description: 周五，中国批准了Innovent Biologics Inc.备受关注的减肥药，这意味着中国本土的减肥药将与国外巨头诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）和礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：China approved Innovent Biologics Inc.’s closely watched weight loss drug Friday, unleashing a potent homegrown competitor against foreign giants Novo Nordisk A/S and Eli Lilly & Co.】

item.title: RTL 同意收购德国天空电视台，扩大德国付费电视基础
item.description: RTL 集团同意以 1.5 亿欧元（1.76 亿美元）的预付价格收购康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）旗下的德国天空电视台（Sky Deutschland），这是这家电视供应商有史以来最大的一笔交易，因为它正在寻找增加新收入来源的途径。【原文：RTL Group agreed to buy Comcast Corp.’s Sky Deutschland for an upfront price of €150 million ($176 million) in the TV provider’s biggest-ever deal as it looks for ways to add new revenue streams.】

item.title: 风险消退，欧洲天然气创两年来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 在与中东紧张局势有关的供应担忧有所缓解之后，欧洲天然气价格将创下近两年来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：European natural gas prices are headed for their biggest weekly retreat in almost two years after supply fears linked to tensions in the Middle East eased.】

item.title: Babbel任命人工智能时代新首席执行官，称已取消IPO计划
item.description: Babbel 的新任首席执行官表示，他将专注于扩展公司的语言学习产品，将新兴的人工智能工具纳入其中，而且他不打算重启公司的首次公开募股。【原文：Babbel’s new chief executive officer said he’s focused on expanding the company’s language-learning product to include emerging artificial intelligence tools, and he doesn’t intend to revive its initial public offering.】

item.title: 中国称与美国确认贸易框架细节
item.description: 中国表示，最近几天已进一步确认了与美国贸易框架的细节，这与美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克早些时候有关中美协议的评论相呼应。【原文：China said it has further confirmed details of a trade framework with the US in recent days, echoing US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick’s earlier comments about a US-China agreement.】

item.title: 法国和西班牙通胀率略有上升，但不足以令欧洲央行担忧
item.description: 法国和西班牙的通胀率有所上升，但不足以引起欧洲中央银行官员的担忧，他们对今年持续实现2%的目标持乐观态度。【原文：Inflation edged up in France and Spain but not enough to concern European Central Bank officials who are optimistic that their 2% target will be met sustainably this year.】
